item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
No.
It took me 9 months to migrate everything to AWS, much longer than I thought.
And I moved to another company after that, I don't think I'm going to try anything to migrate saltstack to CFEngine at least in near future.
item.content:encoded:
No.

It took me 9 months to migrate everything to AWS, much longer than I thought.

And I moved to another company after that, I don’t think I’m going to try anything to migrate saltstack to CFEngine at least in near future.

item.title: By: pandux
item.dc:creator: pandux
item.description: Did you manage move to CFEngine promise ?
item.content:encoded: Did you manage move to CFEngine promise ?
